ABOUT

Hi there! I’m Abhishek Sachan, 16 years old front-end dev. I code, game and tweet and I’m most of the time up with my laptop making creative things of front-end web. Most of my day passes checking and making pens on codepen and learning as much as I can about javascript & svg. SVG is the thing I’m still beginner at. sAnd yeah! I forgot to tell one thing, I’m a gamer too.

When I’m free from everything; gaming is my next thing. To let you know more about me, let me tell you, I’m big fan of Anna Debenhm, Sara Souiedan and Chris Coyier and Lea Verou. One can call them my role models.

I’m extremely fond of a quote said by a girl on Twitter: “On a good day I make the web look awesome; On a bad day I make it suck less.”
